++ Git Pull Forcing Overwrite Of Local Branch With Remotes Version

To forcefully overwrite your local branch with remote changes:

1. `git fetch origin`. 
  - Fetch latest changes from remote.
2. `git reset --hard origin/<branch_name>`
  - Overwrite local branch with remote.
3. `git clean -fd`
  - Remove untracked files/directories.
